name: 3D S.A.
about: At 3D S.A. Flying School, we are dedicated to providing comprehensive and innovative aviation training. Our programs are designed to equip students with the skills and confidence necessary to become proficient pilots. Utilizing cutting-edge technologies, including 3D simulations and real-life flight scenarios, we ensure a deep understanding of cockpit concepts. Our experienced instructors and engaging teaching methods make learning fun and effective. With a focus on safety, efficiency, and sustainability, we prepare our students for successful careers in aviation. Join us to achieve your aviation dreams with confidence and capability.
services:
["Pilot training 
Air Taxi
Air Ambulance
Air Cargo
Aircraft Trading
Aerial Spraying & Fertilization"]
